features: Stay hydrated without slowing down using the hands-free ReTrakt magnetic hose return system
User-friendly 2.5L HydraPak reservoir features a slide closure for easy cleaning and a locking bite valve to prevent leaks before and after your ride
Superior stability for aggressive downhill riding and jumping with a secure fit
Improve bike handling and reduce muscle strain with optimal weight distribution thanks to the low center of gravity
Quickly store and retrieve pads, helmet or chin bar with easy-access lash points
Easily access nutrition, clothing or tools without having to remove the pack thanks to lower-back jersey pockets
Keep tools, pumps, snacks and accessories organized in dedicated internal pockets
Stay visible with reflective details and a light attachment loop
